> [kaffie](#comment_348_1NWh3WAty57FH8at1WtrZigMrdhrDkuPzh): Registered ZeroIDs can be found in the zeroid.bit data.json files. So in your ZN data folder, just go to 1iD5ZQJMNXu43w1qLB8sfdHVKppVMduGz/data/ and you'll see users.json (newly registered users) and users_archive.json (older users). users.json has about 800 people last I checked, and users_archive.json has like 42,000 or something like that. So together that makes about 43,000 zeroid users. [...]

Drag the zero to the left. It opens a window which shows stats about the site you are viewing.
